section.name: DBC_GLS_ICLI
section.code:
*<<<< DBC_GLS_ICLI IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > ZEROES AND RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'IDCCLIINCKEY' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-GLS-ICLI.
IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBC MOVE DBC-IND-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBC MOVE DBC-GLS-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBC MOVE 'DBC-IDC-ICLI' TO FIO-AKEY MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-DBC IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CLI NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN RCC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-GLS-ICLI ELSE MOVE DBC-GLS-NOMC IN DBC TO CPT-STRN PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBC TO FRM-CAI-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBC TO FRM-IIC-ICLI IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: EDT_IKY_RCC
section.code: *<<<< GO TO NXT-IKY-RCC. *>>>>

section.name: EOF_BU
section.code:
*<<<<
VAL-FRM-CAI-ICLI SECTION. INI-VAL-FRM-CAI-ICLI. FIN-VAL-FRM-CAI-ICLI. EXIT.
VAL-FRM-IIC-ICLI SECTION. INI-VAL-FRM-IIC-ICLI. FIN-VAL-FRM-IIC-ICLI. EXIT.
*>>>>

section.name: FIN_EDT_IKY_RCC
section.code: *<<<< NXT-IKY-RCC. * IDC-INI --> BMCHIBCI011.SRCAIU EDICION NUMERICA IF DBC-NUM-ICLI-LEN IN RCC-FLD = FRM-ERR-NUME MOVE FRM-IND-ERRO TO DBC-NUM-ICLI-LEN IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-EDT-IKY-RCC. MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO DBC-NUM-ICLI-EDT IN RCC-EDT. MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI-EDT IN RCC-EDT TO DBC-NUM-ICLI-ALF IN RCC-FLD. * IDC-FIN --> BMCHIBCI011.SRCAIU EDICION NUMERICA IF RCC-HRA-HINI-LEN IN RCC-FLD = FRM-ERR-NUME MOVE FRM-IND-ERRO TO RCC-HRA-HINI-LEN IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-EDT-IKY-RCC. * MOVE RCC-HRA-HINI IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-HRA-HINI-EDT IN RCC-EDT. * MOVE RCC-HRA-HINI-EDT IN RCC-EDT TO * RCC-HRA-HINI-ALF IN RCC-FLD. IF RCC-HRA-HTER-LEN IN RCC-FLD = FRM-ERR-NUME MOVE FRM-IND-ERRO TO RCC-HRA-HTER-LEN IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-EDT-IKY-RCC. * MOVE RCC-HRA-HTER IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-HRA-HTER-EDT IN RCC-EDT. * MOVE RCC-HRA-HTER-EDT IN RCC-EDT TO * RCC-HRA-HTER-ALF IN RCC-FLD. IF RCC-NUM-IRCC-LEN IN RCC-FLD = FRM-ERR-NUME MOVE FRM-IND-ERRO TO RCC-NUM-IRCC-LEN IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-EDT-IKY-RCC. MOVE RCC-NUM-IRCC IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-NUM-IRCC-EDT IN RCC-EDT. MOVE RCC-NUM-IRCC-EDT IN RCC-EDT TO RCC-NUM-IRCC-ALF IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_KEY_RCC_RCC AND PGM_BQ
section.code:
*<<<<
MOVE SPACES TO RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC. IF RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'O' TO RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC ELSE IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE FRM-CAI-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-CAI-ICLI IN RCC MOVE FRM-IIC-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-IIC-ICLI IN RCC MOVE 'C' TO RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC ELSE IF FRM-IIC-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'C' TO RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC.
IF FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD > SPACES *PVG INI 19-ENE-2005 PRECIOS-PLN MOVE FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-COD-GRPO IN RCC *PVG FIN 19-ENE-2005 MOVE 'G' TO RCC-IND-PRGR IN RCC ELSE MOVE 'P' TO RCC-IND-PRGR IN RCC. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_KEY_RCC_RCC AND PGM_BU
section.code:
*<<<< MOVE SPACES TO RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC. IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE FRM-CAI-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-CAI-ICLI IN RCC MOVE FRM-IIC-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-IIC-ICLI IN RCC MOVE 'C' TO RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC. IF RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'O' TO RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC.
IF FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD > SPACES *PVG INI 19-ENE-2005 PRECIOS-PLN MOVE FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD TO RCC-COD-GRPO IN RCC *PVG FIN 19-ENE-2005 MOVE 'G' TO RCC-IND-PRGR IN RCC ELSE MOVE 'P' TO RCC-IND-PRGR IN RCC. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_RCC_RCC
section.code:
*<<<< IF RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC = 'O' MOVE RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC TO RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD MOVE RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC TO RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD MOVE ZEROES TO DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE SPACES TO DBC-VRF-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE SPACES TO DBC-IND-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE SPACES TO DBC-GLS-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN RCC-FLD ELSE IF RCC-IND-OPCL IN RCC = 'C' MOVE SPACES TO RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD MOVE SPACES TO RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD MOVE RCC-CAI-ICLI IN RCC TO DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBC MOVE RCC-IIC-ICLI IN RCC TO DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBC MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-DBC IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CLI NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN RCC-FLD ELSE MOVE DBC-GLS-NOMC IN DBC TO CPT-STRN PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBC TO DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-VRF-ICLI IN DBC TO DBC-VRF-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBC TO DBC-IND-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBC TO DBC-GLS-ICLI IN RCC-FLD. IF RCC-IND-PRGR IN RCC = 'P' MOVE RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC TO RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE RCC-COD-TOOC IN RCC TO RCC-COD-TOOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE RCC-COD-AOOC IN RCC TO RCC-COD-AOOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE SPACES TO FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD ELSE MOVE SPACES TO RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE SPACES TO RCC-COD-TOOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE SPACES TO RCC-COD-AOOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE RCC-COD-GRPO IN RCC TO FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD.
IF RCC-COD-TCNL IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE 'TODOS' TO FRM-GLS-TCNL IN RCC-FLD ELSE MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE 'CNL' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE RCC-COD-TCNL IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM BUS-TAB MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-TCNL IN RCC-FLD. * MOVE 'TAB' TO FIO-SIST. MOVE 'DPL' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-CIC-IRCC IN RCC TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM BUS-TAB. MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC TO FRM-GLS-DES1 IN RCC-FLD. MOVE TAB-GLS-DATA TO FRM-GLS-DES2 IN RCC-FLD.
IF RCC-COD-CPTO IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE 'TCP' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE RCC-COD-CPTO IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM BUS-TAB MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-CPTO IN RCC-FLD ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CPTO IN RCC-FLD.
IF RCC-IND-TPLT IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE 'TDP' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE RCC-IND-TPLT IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM BUS-TAB MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-TPLT IN RCC-FLD ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TPLT IN RCC-FLD.
IF RCC-IND-VIGE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'GNS' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE 'STT' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE RCC-IND-VIGE IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM BUS-TAB MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-VIGE IN RCC-FLD ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-VIGE IN RCC-FLD.
*>>>>

section.name: FIN_RCC_IND_RTBL
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_IND_RTBL IF RCC-IND-RTBL IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDRTBL INV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IND-RTBL.
IF RCC-IND-RTBL IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-COD-TREC IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES AND DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDRTBL INV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IND-RTBL.
IF RCC-IND-RTBL IN RCC-FLD = SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IND-RTBL.
MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'RTB' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-IND-RTBL IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IND-RTBL. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_RCC_IND_TPLT
section.code:
*<<<<
MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'TDP' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-IND-TPLT IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-TAB. IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR 'COD NVG' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TPLT PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC IN MSG TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-TPLT. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_UNP_FLD_RCC
section.code: *<<<< IF SCR-CMND = 'VRF' OR 'ACA' OR 'ANL' MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO FRM-GLS-DES1-ATR IN RCC-FLD MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO FRM-GLS-DES2-ATR IN RCC-FLD. IF SCR-CMND = 'ING' AND RCC-NUM-IRCC IN RCC-FLD > 1 MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO FRM-GLS-DES1-ATR IN RCC-FLD MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO FRM-GLS-DES2-ATR IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_UNP_RCC_RCC
section.code: *<<<< IF SCR-CMND = 'VRF' OR 'ACA' OR 'ANL' MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO RCC-COD-CPTO-ATR IN RCC-FLD MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO RCC-CAI-PLAN-ATR IN RCC-FLD MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO RCC-IIC-PLAN-ATR IN RCC-FLD MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO RCC-IND-TPLT-ATR IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_VAL_IKY_RCC
section.code:
*<<<<
MOVE SPACES TO MSG-COD-MENS.
MOVE RCC-NUM-DINI IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-DINI IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-NUM-MINI IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-MINI IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-NUM-SINI IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-SINI IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-NUM-AINI IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-AINI IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-HRA-HINI-ALF IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-HRA-HINI IN WSS-VARI.
MOVE RCC-NUM-DTER IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-DTER IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-NUM-MTER IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-MTER IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-NUM-STER IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-STER IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-NUM-ATER IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-ATER IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-HRA-HTER-ALF IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-HRA-HTER IN WSS-VARI.
*PVG INI 15-DIC-2004 MANEJO DE CAMPANA HORARIA IF WSS-FEC-FTER IN WSS-VARI NOT > ZEROES GO TO FIN-VAL-IKY-RCC. *PVG FIN 15-DIC-2004
IF WSS-GLS-FHTR IN WSS-VARI NOT > WSS-GLS-FHIN IN WSS-VARI MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'FTER<=FINI' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR MOVE FRM-IND-ERRO TO RCC-FEC-FINI-LEN IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-IKY-RCC.
*>>>>

section.name: FRM_COD_GRPO
section.code:
*<<<< FRM_COD_GRPO IF FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND ( RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC-FLD > SPACES OR RCC-COD-TOOC IN RCC-FLD > SPACES OR RCC-COD-AOOC IN RCC-FLD > SPACES OR RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES OR RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES ) MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'GRPO NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-FRM-COD-GRPO.
*PVG INI 19-ENE-2005 PRECIOS-PLN IF FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-FRM-COD-GRPO.
MOVE FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD TO PLN-CIC-PLAN IN PLN. MOVE 99999999 TO PLN-FEC-FINI IN PLN. MOVE 999999 TO PLN-HRA-HINI IN PLN. MOVE FIO-GET-LEQ TO FIO-CMND. LUP-VAL-FRM-COD-GRPO. PERFORM TAB-FIO-PLN. IF NOT (FIO-STAT-OKS AND PLN-CIC-PLAN IN PLN = FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD) MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'PLN NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-FRM-COD-GRPO.
IF PLN-MSC-STAT IN PLN NOT = 'A' MOVE FIO-GET-PRV TO FIO-CMND GO TO LUP-VAL-FRM-COD-GRPO.
*VAL-COD Valida codigo de Grupo MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'DPN' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE PLN-CIC-IPRD IN PLN TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR 'COD NVG' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-GRPO IN RCC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-GRPO IN RCC-FLD. *PVG FIN 19-ENE-2005 *>>>>

section.name: FRM_IIC_ICLI
section.code:
*<<<< IF FRM-IIC-ICLI IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-IIC-ICLI IN RCC-FLD.
IF FRM-IIC-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE FRM-CAI-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBC MOVE FRM-IIC-ICLI IN RCC-FLD TO DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBC MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-DBC IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CLI NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN RCC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-FRM-IIC-ICLI ELSE MOVE DBC-GLS-NOMC IN DBC TO CPT-STRN PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBC TO DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-VRF-ICLI IN DBC TO DBC-VRF-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBC TO DBC-IND-ICLI IN RCC-FLD MOVE DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBC TO DBC-GLS-ICLI IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: INI_FRM_GLS_DES2
section.code: *<<<< IF FRM-GLS-DES2 IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-DES2 IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FRM-GLS-DES2. *>>>>

section.name: INI_RCC_FEC_FINI
section.code: *<<<< INI_RCC_FEC_FINI MOVE FEC-VHBL-N TO FEC-VHBL. IF RCC-FEC-FINI IN RCC-FLD NOT > ZEROES PERFORM GET-FHOY MOVE HOY-SHOY TO RCC-NUM-SINI IN RCC-FLD MOVE HOY-AHOY TO RCC-NUM-AINI IN RCC-FLD MOVE HOY-MHOY TO RCC-NUM-MINI IN RCC-FLD MOVE HOY-DHOY TO RCC-NUM-DINI IN RCC-FLD. MOVE RCC-FEC-FINI IN RCC-FLD TO FEC-FECH. MOVE FEC-VHBL-N TO FEC-VHBL. IF SCR-CMND = 'CON' OR 'ELI' OR 'MOD' OR 'ANL' MOVE FEC-CHOY-N TO FEC-CHOY ELSE MOVE FEC-CHOY-GE TO FEC-CHOY. *>>>>

section.name: INI_RCC_FEC_FTER
section.code: *<<<< INI_RCC_FEC_FTER *PVG INI 15-DIC-2004 MANEJO DE CAMPANA HORARIA * IF RCC-FEC-FTER IN RCC-FLD NOT > ZEROES * MOVE 20 TO RCC-NUM-STER IN RCC-FLD * MOVE 99 TO RCC-NUM-ATER IN RCC-FLD * MOVE 12 TO RCC-NUM-MTER IN RCC-FLD * MOVE 31 TO RCC-NUM-DTER IN RCC-FLD. *PVG FIN 15-DIC-2004 MOVE RCC-FEC-FTER IN RCC-FLD TO FEC-FECH. MOVE FEC-VHBL-N TO FEC-VHBL. IF SCR-CMND = 'CON' OR 'ELI' OR 'MOD' OR 'ANL' MOVE FEC-CHOY-N TO FEC-CHOY ELSE MOVE FEC-CHOY-GE TO FEC-CHOY. *PVG INI 15-DIC-2004 MANEJO DE CAMPANA HORARIA IF RCC-FEC-FTER IN RCC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE FEC-CHOY-N TO FEC-CHOY. *PVG FIN 15-DIC-2004 *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_RCC
section.code: *<<<< PERFORM VAL-FRM-CAI-ICLI. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE FRM-IND-ERRO TO FRM-CAI-ICLI-LEN IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCC. PERFORM VAL-FRM-IIC-ICLI. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE FRM-IND-ERRO TO FRM-IIC-ICLI-LEN IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCC. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_BQ AND FIN_PRO_IKY_RCC
section.code: *<<<< MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO FRM-COD-GRPO-ATR IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_BQ AND FIN_UNP_IKY_RCC
section.code: *<<<< MOVE FRM-CPIM-UBY TO FRM-COD-GRPO-ATR IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_CAI_IOPE
section.code: *<<<< RCC_CAI_IOPE IF RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES AND RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-CAI-IOPE. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_CAI_PLAN
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_CAI_PLAN IF RCC-COD-CPTO IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-CAI-PLAN IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-CAI-PLAN.
*>>>>

section.name: RCC_COD_AOOC
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_COD_AOOC *PVG INI 19-ENE-2005 PRECIOS-PLN * IF RCC-COD-AOOC IN RCC-FLD = SPACES * MOVE 'TODOS ' TO FRM-GLS-AOOC IN RCC-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-AOOC. IF RCC-COD-AOOC IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES IF FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE 'TODOS ' TO FRM-GLS-AOOC IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-AOOC ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-AOOC IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-AOOC. *PVG FIN 19-ENE-2005
IF RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES OR RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'AUX NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-AOOC IN RCC-FLD PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-AOOC.
*VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'AUX' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-COD-TOOC IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-COD-TOOC IN WSS-VARI. MOVE RCC-COD-AOOC IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-COD-AOOC IN WSS-VARI. MOVE WSS-COD-CAUX IN WSS-VARI TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR 'COD NVG' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-AOOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-AOOC IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_COD_BANC
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_COD_BANC IF RCC-COD-BANC IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CODBANC INV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-BANC.
IF RCC-COD-BANC IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-COD-TREC IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES AND DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CODBANC INV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-BANC.
IF RCC-COD-BANC IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-BANC.
MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'BAN' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-COD-BANC IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-BANC. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_COD_CNAL
section.code: *<<<< RCC_COD_CNAL IF RCC-COD-CNAL IN RCC-FLD = SPACES MOVE 'TODOS ' TO FRM-GLS-CNAL IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-CNAL. IF RCC-COD-TCNL IN RCC-FLD NOT = '010' MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE RCC-COD-TCNL IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE RCC-COD-CNAL IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM VAL-COD IF MSG-COD-MENS NOT > SPACES MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-CNAL IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-CNAL ELSE MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-CNAL ELSE MOVE RCC-COD-CNAL IN RCC-FLD TO OFI-COD-OFIC IN OFI PERFORM VAL-OFI IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR 'COD NVG' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CNAL IN RCC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE OFI-GLS-DESC IN OFI TO FRM-GLS-CNAL IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_COD_CPTO
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_COD_CPTO IF RCC-COD-CPTO IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-CPTO.
IF RCC-COD-CPTO IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE 'TCP' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE RCC-COD-CPTO IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM VAL-COD IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR 'COD NVG' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CPTO IN RCC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CPTO IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_COD_TCNL
section.code: *<<<< RCC_COD_TCNL MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'CNL' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-COD-TCNL IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS NOT > SPACES MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-TCNL IN RCC-FLD ELSE MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-TCNL. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_COD_TOOC
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_COD_TOOC *PVG INI 19-ENE-2005 PRECIOS-PLN * IF RCC-COD-TOOC IN RCC-FLD = SPACES * MOVE 'TODOS ' TO FRM-GLS-TOOC IN RCC-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-TOOC. IF RCC-COD-TOOC IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES IF FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE 'TODOS ' TO FRM-GLS-TOOC IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-TOOC ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TOOC IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-TOOC. *PVG FIN 19-ENE-2005
IF RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES OR RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'TIO NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TOOC IN RCC-FLD PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-TOOC.
*VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'TIO ' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-COD-TOOC IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR 'COD NVG' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TOOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-TOOC IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_COD_TREC
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_COD_TREC IF RCC-COD-TREC IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDRECINCKEY' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-TREC.
IF RCC-COD-TREC IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDRECINCKEY' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-TREC.
*VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'REC ' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-COD-TREC IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-TREC.
*>>>>

section.name: RCC_COD_VCOC
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_COD_VCOC *PVG INI 19-ENE-2005 PRECIOS-PLN * IF RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC-FLD = SPACES * MOVE 'TODAS ' TO FRM-GLS-VCOC IN RCC-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-VCOC. IF RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES IF FRM-COD-GRPO IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE 'TODAS ' TO FRM-GLS-VCOC IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-VCOC ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-VCOC IN RCC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-VCOC. *PVG FIN 19-ENE-2005
IF RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC-FLD = 'P ' OR RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC-FLD = 'M ' OR RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES OR RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VCOC NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-VCOC IN RCC-FLD PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-COD-VCOC.
*VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'VLR ' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RCC-COD-VCOC IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR 'COD NVG' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-VCOC IN RCC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-VCOC IN RCC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_HRA_HINI
section.code: *<<<< RCC_HRA_HINI IF RCC-HRA-HINI IN RCC-FLD NOT > ZEROES PERFORM GET-FHOY MOVE HOY-HHOY TO RCC-HRA-HINI IN RCC-FLD. MOVE RCC-HRA-HINI IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-HRA-HINI. IF WSS-NUM-HHIN IN WSS-VARI > 24 MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'HRAINI NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE IF WSS-NUM-MMIN IN WSS-VARI > 59 MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'MININI NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE IF WSS-NUM-SSIN IN WSS-VARI > 59 MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'SEGINI NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_HRA_HTER
section.code: *<<<< RCC_HRA_HTER IF RCC-HRA-HTER IN RCC-FLD NOT > ZEROES *PVG INI 15-DIC-2004 MANEJO DE CAMPANA HORARIA * MOVE 235959 TO RCC-HRA-HTER IN RCC-FLD. MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'HRATEROBL ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-HRA-HTER. *PVG FIN 15-DIC-2004 MOVE RCC-HRA-HTER IN RCC-FLD TO WSS-HRA-HTER. IF WSS-NUM-HHTR IN WSS-VARI > 23 MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'HRATER NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE IF WSS-NUM-MMTR IN WSS-VARI > 59 MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'MINTER NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE IF WSS-NUM-SSTR IN WSS-VARI > 59 MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'SEGTER NOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_IIC_IOPE
section.code: *<<<< RCC_IIC_IOPE IF RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES AND RCC-CAI-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IIC-IOPE. *>>>>

section.name: RCC_IIC_PLAN
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_IIC_PLAN IF RCC-CAI-PLAN IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-IIC-PLAN IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-CAI-PLAN.
*>>>>

section.name: RCC_IND_COMP
section.code:
*<<<< RCC_IND_COMP IF RCC-IND-COMP IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-IIC-IOPE IN RCC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDCOMP INV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IND-COMP.
IF RCC-IND-COMP IN RCC-FLD > SPACES AND RCC-COD-TREC IN RCC-FLD NOT > SPACES AND DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDCOMP INV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IND-COMP.
IF RCC-IND-COMP IN RCC-FLD = SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IND-COMP.
* MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST. * MOVE 'FDR' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. * MOVE RCC-IND-COMP IN RCC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. * PERFORM VAL-COD. * IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES * MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS * MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR * GO TO FIN-VAL-RCC-IND-COMP. *>>>>
